column4: please give us the errors you get with both lilo and grub...  BTW since when is a bios provided to lilo?
It says something about newer bios
Unable to install GRUB in /dev/sda
does it give anything else?
let us know once you've completed the install so we can check your boot options
Here is the full error. Configuring grub-pc unable to install grub in /dev/sda executing grub-install /dev/sda failded.
that's it?
and what does lilo give you?
Does lilo work with booting windows?
it is included in the default config
where did you get that?  booting?
I think it's confused
give me your lilo.conf on pastebin please
how?
I mean how do I get to it
ok, check your lilo.conf to see if it contains any reference to sdb and change it to sda
Where is it:P
/etc/lilo.conf
yes do that
I'm not sure I would have followed this approach if I had known that you didn't even have a lilo.conf file...  why did you say it wasn't working if it was simply not configured^
start with /etc/lilo.conf.example
